name: How many moles of water are found on Earth?
The mass of the Sun is equivalent to the mass of how many school buses?
The wavelength of visible green light is equivalent to how many toothpick diameters?
The volume of the Pacific Ocean is equivalent to the volume of how many keyboard keys?
How many bolts of lightning strike Earth's surface each year?
How many nanoseconds of content is uploaded to YouTube in two weeks?
How many terameters are in an angstrom?
What percentage of the total water on Earth is found in rivers?
What percentage of people who have ever lived are alive today?
How many total schools are in the state of Florida?
How many humans would it take to accumulate enough total DNA to string together a strand that is equivalent to the estimated diameter of the observable universe?
What is the ratio of the human population in 2000BCE to the population in 8000BCE?
What is the total number of reported Covid-19 cases worldwide?
How many species of insect are found in Florida?
How many amperes is enough to kill an average adult male?
If a coin is flipped 239 times, what are the odds of getting all heads? (The common log of 2 is .30)
How many meters do you travel in total displacement within the milky way galaxy over a lifetime?
How many carbon atoms are found in a 20 fl oz (about 600mL) bottle of Coca-Cola?
What is the probability of a randomly selected person on Each having an IQ of above 200?
How many femtojoules are in a petajoule?
What is the probability, in percentage, of finding a particle anywhere within a rigid box (the walls are impenetrable)? For reference, ψ=Asin[(nπ/L)*x].
Without accounting for inflation, how much money, in US dollars, did the highest grossing film of all time generate?
What is the coefficient of kinetic friction for wet ice?
How long is the total length of your short and long intestine in meters?
A 27 base pair DNA strand could code for how many different polypeptides?
How much heat in joules is required to raise the temperature of all of the earth's ocean water by 2 degrees celsius?
How many air molecules in a breath you take could have been shared by Einstein during his life?
How many words comprise the entire Harry Potter book series?
At its all time high, what would be the height, in meters, of 2023 bitcoin as a stack of one hundred dollar bills?
How many hours of coursework/studying does it take to complete a bachelor's degree?
Approximately how many mutations have occurred in the DNA of your cells in 1 hour?
How many 2x4 lego bricks would it take to equal the volume of the earth.
How many 2022 Toyota Prii (plural for Prius) stacked on top each other would it take to reach the moon.

In September 2022, two gas pipes under the Baltic Sea began to leak methane. Conservative estimates suggest that methane was leaking at a rate of 500 metric tons per hour. Assume this rate is constant. How many cows would it take to “leak” methane at the same rate on average (via farting).
How much electricity was consumed in the U.S. in 2021, in kilowatt-hours (kWh)?
Consider a man who has 20 kg of body fat when he goes on a hunger strike. Determine how long he can survive on his body fat alone in decades.
How many bits of data are in all of Taylor Swift's albums (excluding her upcoming album Midnights) at FM radio quality?
How much would a Boeing 747 weigh in newtons if it's entire interior were filled with cement?

If an average human were able to grow out their hair infinitely, how long would they have to grow it in miles for the total mass of the hair on their head to be equal to the mass of adult plains zebra?
How many times will the average human's heart beat in their lifetime?
How many lightning strikes occur in the United States per year?
How many molecules of water are in the average American woman?
In 2020, how many tons of salmon was consumed in Japan?
How many Chinese wontons did we make with 1000 pigs worth of meat?
If you decide to drink no more than a shotglass's worth of coconut milk a day, how many days until you would have consumed enough coconut milk to fill an Olympic size swimming pool?
You decide to take a road trip from Omaha, Nebraska, to Irvine, California. How many times would you have to refill your gas tank during your road trip?
How many ounces of food can an average human fit in their stomach before it would (literally) explode?
I love bananas. I take out around 4 from the dining hall everyday. If I double my intake from the previous day, every day, for 3 years, what daily value % of potassium would I have the last day?
In Oct 2022, Elon Musk's net worth recently went down 5%. How many happy meals could we have provided with that money?

How many soft shell tacos from Taco Bell could you have bought with the money you could've saved by getting a McDonald's adult happy meal instead of dining at Gordan Ramsey's Hell's Kitchen every night for a year?
How many ways are there to arrange the letters of RICKARDSSCIENCEOLYMPIAD?
How many atoms are there combined in all of the people in North America and South America (including Central America) assuming they are all average adults?

3 people are buying SciOly invitational medals at a rate of 5 medals per second each. If Amazon's 2021 revenue was evenly distributed among the 3 of them, how long in exaseconds would it take 1 of the buyers to have spent all of their money?
How many fortnights ago from Nov 6th 2022, was the first recorded Science Olympiad competition?
If the stars in the universe were evenly distributed among all of the galaxies in the universe, what would be the amount of stars in each galaxy?
How many blue whales would it take to line up lengthwise across the diameter of half of the universe?
Since the start of the COVID-19 pandemic, how many people in the world have recovered from the virus?
How many pairs of Nike shoes would China have to sell (based on MSRP) to gain a projected total revenue of $100 billion?
How many pages are there in the AP Calculus Textbook by Ron Larson and Bruce Edwards?
How many positive integral divisors does the number 27,081,081,027,000 have?
What is the largest number that can be represented using a 64-bit signed integer?
How many cents per hour of footage would it cost to to store a 60 fps 4K video on hard drives? Assume it cost $10 to store one terabyte to store data in a hard drive.

The Library of Babel is a fictional library, described in the Jorge Luis Borges short story of the same name, that contains every possible book composed of 3,000 characters (limited to the 26 uppercase and lowercase English letters, spaces, and periods). How many books are in the Library of Babel?
Suppose I spent all of my free time over summer break watching Netflix. What proportion of Netflix's total 2021-2022 viewing time would this constitute?
If the number of cells in the average human body decreased by half in the half-life length of carbon-14, then how long in hours would it take for only 1 cell to remain?
As of now, Drake's most listened to song on Spotify has billions of plays. For how many jiffies (3.33*10^24 sec) has the song been listened to?
How many golf balls would it take to fill up all the tanks in the Atlanta Aquarium?
What is the weight in nanograms of all the coffee beans that were consumed in 2022
How long would it take in seconds for an ant to diagonally cross a football field?
For how many days can a person survive on all of the oxygen produced by the Amazon rainforest in one minute?
How many unique legal chess positions are possible after both sides have played 8 moves each?
How many Calories are there in a Pizza Hut Pepperoni pizza the size of a baseball field?
How many dozens of glazed donuts can I buy from Dunkin Donuts in a year with the yearly salary of a US Senator
How long in minutes will it take a person to play Beethoven's Fifth Symphony at each of London's metro stations? (you do not need to account for travel time between stations)
How many atoms are there in a basketball?
What was the power in watts needed to run New York''s train system in 2021?
How many meters on average did a person in Switzerland travel by train in 2021?
If you randomly pick 5 distinct letters of the English alphabet (in a particular order) what is the probability that they form a word present in the Oxford Dictionary?
How many credit card transactions took place in the world in 2022?

Tom has a chess board with 1 jellybean on the first square, 3 jellybeans on the second square, 9 jellybeans on the third square and so on with the nth square having 3n-1 jellybeans on it. How many jellybeans does Tom have in total
How many people can the Eiffel Tower hold at maximum capacity?
At what temperature in Kelvin does a forest fire burn?
How many cups of coffee are consumed in the United States every day?
How many strands of hair are there on all the heads of people in the world?
How many seconds of videos have been uploaded to YouTube in 2022?
How many toothpicks are needed to completely cover the body of a blue whale?
How long ago, in months, was the first Science Olympiad National Tournament(US)?
How many volleyballs would fit in Lake Erie (Lake Erie is the fourth largest lake by surface area of the five Great Lakes in North America)?
How many Earths would fit in the Moon?
How many total legs would there be in a great hundred dogs plus a score of cats?
How many honey bees are there in the world?
How long, in minutes, would it take the average person to type Shakespeare's Romeo and Juliet?
How many days ago did John Hancock 'John Hancock' the Declaration of Independence?
If the entire US population stood in a socially-distanced line, how many millimeters would it stretch?
What is the land area of Earth in hectares?
How many runs have been scored in the history of Major League Baseball?
How many accounts follow the most-followed Twitter account?
How many letters are in the English Alphabet?
How many grains of rice are in a 10 kilogram bag of rice?
What are the odds of getting heads on 12 consecutive flips of a standard quarter?
How many Earths does a single water molecule weigh?
How tall was Robert Pershing Wadlow, the tallest known human in history, in attometers?
If every fish on earth was being hunted by every cat on earth, how many cats would there be per fish?
How many text characters are in the content pages of Wikipedia?
How much electricity was used globally in 2022, in picojoules?
How many regular M&Ms would fit inside the sun? Assume the M&Ms do not melt or stick together.
How many standard lab goggles would it take to equal the weight of a full-grown adult blue whale?
How many grains of sand are there on the beaches and deserts on Earth?
How many days would it take Usain Bolt to run the average distance from the Earth to the moon and back, assuming he runs continuously and at world-record pace the entire time?
How many fortnights ago did dinosaurs become extinct?
What is the height of Mt. Everest in exameters?
How many human babies are born every year?
An ampere is equal to how many electrons per second?
How many faces are there on a rhombicosidodecahedron?
How many standard Oreos placed flat, side by side, would it take to circle the earth at the equator?
How many keys are on a standard piano?
How many pizzas are ordered in the US every year on Super Bowl Sunday?
How long would it take a person walking at average human walking speed to travel the distance from NYC to LA?
How many leaflets do Aesculus glabra (Ohio Buckeye) leaves usually contain?
We had to Google a ton of research to create this exam. How many Google searches are done every day?
If you froze all the freshwater (include all sources, not just surface lakes, ponds, etc.) on Earth into an ice cube, what would the side length of the cube be in meters?

Directly after worldwide release, how many seconds did J.K. Rowling have to wait until she sold enough copies of Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows to be able to stack them to the International Space Station?
About how many pounds of corn are grown and harvested in Indiana each year?
How many seconds would it take your voice to travel the equivalent distance from the Earth's surface to the moon?
Intel 4004 was the first ever commercially produced microprocessor. How many times more transistors are on the new Apple M2 chip, compared to the Intel 4004 chip?
How many times hotter is the hottest capsaicinoid compared to the hottest jalapeno peppers, on the scoville scale?
How many days would it take to watch all of Netflix (assume Netflix US)?
How many megabytes of data would it take to stream all of Netflix (assume Netflix US) in HD?

If you used a BIC ballpoint pen to draw a continuous straight line, how many paper napkins would you need to draw on until the pen ran out of ink? In other words, if you used the pen to draw one single horizontal line on each napkin, where the line is equal to the side length of the square napkin, how many napkins could you draw on until the pen ran out of ink?
How many Kahoot sets have been created since the inception of the site?
How many genes does a fruit fly have?
How many molecules of sugar are there in a 12 oz. Mexican Coca Cola bottle?
How many hours would it take the Saturn V rocket, traveling constantly at its top speed, to finish Han Solo's famous 12-parsec Kessel Run?

In Mission Impossible: Rogue Nation, Tom Cruises' character, Ethan Hunt, holds onto the side of a plane as it takes off.Assuming that the plane took off at a constant velocity of 200 mph, and that Ethan is holding the plane such that his body is aligned with the wind (“diver position”), how many Newtons of force are exerted on Ethan Hunt by air resistance?

Assuming that an iPhone 14 has a 3000 mAh battery that is rated at 3.7 volts, how many more kilograms does an iPhone 14 weigh when fully charged, compared to when its battery is completely empty, all else equal? Assume for simplicity that all electrons in the battery have zero kinetic motion, regardless of the battery being charged or not.
During the 2019 Super Bowl, how many seconds were spent by consumers watching Super Bowl ads on YouTube?
How long would it take, in hours, to drive to Jupiter assuming it was a straight path and the person never had to stop in hours?
How many times was COVID, COVID-19, or coronavirus mentioned in 2022 on Reddit
How much caffeine does the average college student consume per day in picograms?
During an Ironman marathon, the average male marathoner burns how many calories in terms of the number of avocado toast servings?
If all students on UM's Ann Arbor campus shouted, how loud would the sound be equivalent to the sound produced in decibels?

How long, in seconds, would it take a golf ball hit by a professional golfer with a five-iron on average to travel the Nile River assuming it was a straight path and the golf ball traveled straight along the path?
If Oscars were made of solid gold and all of the Oscars ever awarded were melted, how much in value would it be in US dollars?
How many 13-in MacBook Pros would it take to weigh the same amount as a USPS delivery van?
How many new pieces of malware are detected each day all over the world?
How many different species of frogs are known to live in the Amazon rainforest?
In the 2022 Winter Olympic and Paralympic Games, how many medals were awarded?
Assuming an adult Black Iberian Pig was made of pure Plutonium-239, how long would it take to decompose naturally with its half life to the mass of an American penny in years?
In the first 24 hours of release, how many streams did Taylor Swift's album “Midnights” get worldwide?
How many physical Christmas holiday cards are sent annually across the world?
How many rotisserie chickens did Costco sell in 2021?
How many red blood cells are contained within your body?
How many atoms are contained in your body?
What is the surface area of your skin, in km^2?
How many digits do you have on your hand and feet?
Andru and Rae wants to buy a ton (unit) of average store brought pineapples. How many pineapples did they buy?
How many times more would a 50 foot tall pine tree weigh compared to an apple?
How much would a cubic meter of dirt weigh, in milligrams?
How many gallons of air are breathed in with one breath at rest?
How many grass blades are in contact with one foot stepping on grass?
How far in gigameters would they need to travel from NYC to reach Paris?
How many ways are there to make change for a dollar (Quarters, dimes, nickels, pennies)?
If I can read a book a day, how many picoseconds would it take for me to read every book that has ever been published?
How many languages are currently spoken in the world?
How many letters are utilized by THIS very quirky sentence?
(Biology) How many molecules of ATP are used by an average adult over the period of a fortnight?
How large is the surface area of the United States in Barns (unit, not building)?
In the duration of the Black Plague pandemic, how many humans died per year globally?
The cubit is the first known unit of length used by ancient humans, while the Planck units were very recent, first originating in 1899. How many Planck lengths long is one typical cubit?
How many years ago did Homo sapiens originate?
What is the number of meters light will travel in one day?
What is the number of heart beats taken in the lifetime of an octogenarian?
What is the number of kilometers in a light year?
If a person weighs 150 lb on Earth, what would the weight be on Jupiter?
Assume there is an empty room that is 10 ft. x 10 ft x 10 ft.  How many baseballs could fit in this room?
How many atoms are there in an unused, standard #2 pencil?
How many Pringle potato chips, stacked in their normal way, would be needed to make a stack 100 m high?
How many gallons of water fall over Niagara Falls in an average July day?
How many gallons of paint would it take to cover the surface of the earth?
How many gallons of water are flushed during the half time of the Super Bowl?
How many molecules of water are there in a liter of water?
How many electrons are there in a liter of water?
How many quarter-pounder all beef hamburgers can be made from the average steer
How many grams of M & M's (plain) would fill an Olympic swimming pool?
What is the volume of the earth in cubic kilometers?
What fraction of the earth's mass is the moon?
How many light-years would 30 kiloparsec be?
If all of the Earth's oceans were transported to the Moon, what would be the average depth, in meters, of the lunar ocean?
How many quills does an average porcupine have?
How many jellybeans would it take to fill an NBA basketball?
If you had to shovel a fluffy snowfall (12 in deep) off of your driveway (25 m long x 4 m wide), how many kilograms of snow did you shovel?
What is the total length in cm of all the blood vessels in the human body?
How many hours elapse from one full moon to the next one?
What is 115 to the power of 48?
What is the distance between Cleveland and Columbus in lightyears?
How many poker chips would you need to make a stack that could reach the moon from Earth?
How many seconds elapse from one full moon to the next?
How many golf balls could fit in a Boeing 747?
How many pounds of milk are produced in the US within a year?
If you poured at a rate of one drop of water per second, how long would it take you in hours to fill an Olympic-sized swimming pool?
During the time interval of this test, how many cm has light traveled in a vacuum?
Within a year, how many gallons does the average human heart pump?
What is the diameter of the nucleus of a human cell in km?
How many watt-hours does a typical household refrigerator use per year?
How many standard milk cartons would it take to fill up Lake Erie?
If you were going the speed of sound, how long would it take you to reach the bottom of the Mariana Trench in hours?
How many fish live in all the oceans combined?
Within a year, how many cups of coffee do Americans consume?
What is the difference between the combined net worth of the 10 richest people in the world and the next 10 richest people in the world in US dollars?
What is the amount of iron atoms found in one gram of iron?
How many McDonald's Happy Meals are sold in the US within a year?
Of the students attending Ohio State University, how many are left-handed?
Within the past week, how far has the Earth traveled in miles?
Using a standard 52-card deck, how many combinations of a 5-card hand can be drawn?
Going the speed of the fastest roller coaster in the world (Formula Rossa), how long would it take in hours to travel from the Sun to Pluto?
If the entire ocean froze over, what is the total increase in volume in cubic meters?
How many hours, working a minimum wage job in Ohio, would it take to earn the same amount of money as the box office total for Avatar: The Way of Water?
What is the diameter of the Andromeda Galaxy in parsecs?
On average, how many gallons of gasoline are used in the US per day?
How many standard bathtubs of water would it take to fill up the Grand Canyon?
If you were to lay out all the arteries, capillaries, and veins of an average adult human, how many humans would you need to wrap around the circumference of the Sun?
How many searches does Google, on average, process every second?
How many seconds would it take for light to travel from the base to the top of the tallest building in the world?
How many planet Earths could fit inside the planet Jupiter?
What is the volume of a human skin cell in cubic meters?
